reviews.reviewText:
This product is amazing. I've made chicken wings, mozzarella sticks, and fries in it in the few days I've had it, and they all are incredible.

My only complaint is that the non-stick coating on the frying basket has already begun flaking off. Going to contact the manufacturer to see if I can get a replacement on that part.

UPDATE: seller was very helpful, promptly provided replacement for the basket, no issues with the new one yet

reviews.reviewTitle: Good capacity, easy to use and clean
reviews.reviewText:
Cooking with an air fryer is still an experiment for us, therefore this appliance has yet to claim a permenant spot on the counter. This means it gets to be taken out, used, cleaned, and stored away quite often. This air fryer feels sturdy but not heavy. Once the frying compartment is clicked into place, the whole unit can be easily lifted with the handle and be moved around. The frying compartment is roomy enought to cook (each time) a thick cut 12 oz steak; a large size blooming onion; 3 skewers each with generous chunks of meat and veggie. One time we used it to degrease some fresh bacon and were pleasantly surprised how well it did the job.

We do use a parchment paper liner everytime we cook to help protect the non-stick surface of the screen. Learning from our mistakes with using other non-stick cookwares over the years, we do not let the scouring side of the sponge touch the non-stick surface when cleaning it. So far the cleaning has been very easy. We are very happy with this purchase.

I was skeptical of getting an air fryer. I found this model at a pretty decent price and it is a decent size. I have literally been cooking everything in this air fryer and couldn't be happier. Just wish I would have pulled the trigger earlier. The lcd screen allows you to very easily set the time and temperature. Only bad thing can be cleaning if you make something messy, but I usually just throw it in my dishwasher and it comes out nice. Definitely recommend!

My son made some French fries the first day we received our air fryer. He threw the fries away (no fault of the fryer) but it is different from an oil deep fryer. Soaking the potatoes after cutting them for an hour or two is helpful. As the potatoes cooked I added a little olive oil cooking spray and salt and they came out great... I enjoyed tasting my food, not the grease.

The only reason i didn't give this thing 5 stars is because i haven't had it very long so i don't know how it holds up with repeated use yet, only time will tell that but so far it is a life saver ! i Have three boys plus my fiance' to feed and the ultralean makes those night when i get home from work and am just too tired to cook so very very easy. I cannot even explain how much this helps me. You just set the temp and the time and go. You don't have t wait for the oven to pre-heat and the food cooks quickly and is always really good ! I am going to start making more variety of food and see how things turn out. UPDATE ***
So.... My air fryer has recently been displaying the error code E1 and I'd not covered in the booklet that came with it? From what I have been looking up, I am probably going to have to replace the whole thing and after not even a year's use out if yet, I am not happy at all. I loved this thing and all of a sudden it just stops working properly! Not good at all!

** Update 1/27/19. Company contacted me and insisted on sending me another unit free of charge to try. New unit works as advertised and heated my leftover french fries to crisp at the 10 minutes. This second one works as it promises. Great customer service!

Original review**Took me well over an hour to cook chicken nuggets to warm, never could get crisp. Not sure if something is wrong with it or what but it takes forever to cook anything. I tried multiple foods and it never got hot enough to cook quickly as people say air dryers are supposed to. Very bulky too. I returned. I'll stick with my toaster oven.

reviews.reviewTitle: Healthy alternative to fried foods AWESOME
reviews.reviewText: My first meal I prepared with this was some pork chops they came out great!!! I love this air fryer absolutely mind blowing and setting up was a beeeze. It’s also easy to operate! This is definitely a great investment

reviews.reviewTitle: I am very happy with this purchase
reviews.reviewText: I have not used cooking oil since buying product. I am very happy with this purchase

I've had the Ultrean Air Fryer for less than 2 months and have used it maybe a dozen times. I really like the way it cooks food but I do have a couple of complaints about the grill insert. It's difficult to clean (food residue from grilled chicken doesn't come off easily plus there are lots of little nooks for the food to hide) and the paint on the grill is not very durable. You can see from the photo where the paint has come off in multiple places (I used a Scotch-Brite pad to clean it). I think it would have been better to make the grill out of stainless steel.
LOVEEE THIS PRODUCT!! JUST MADE WINGS AND ALL I DID WAS DIP THEM IN EGG AND FLOUR AND THEY CAME OUT SO CRISPY ..NO OIL ADDED. THIS IS GOING TO BE A GO TO FOR CHRISTMAS GIFTS!! TOTALLY GREAT BUY

I bought this brand based on all the good reviews.
The first time I used it the two bottom
buttons stuck. It was very difficult to finish what
I was cooking. I will buy another air fryer as the
food was good, but another brand. Picture attached. Update: company sent me a free replacement which works perfectly. This company is dedicated to customer satisfaction with their products. Would buy from them again.

DANGER!!!! This item is extremely dangerous. From the very first use, this appliance output so much carbon monoxide that it set off the detectors in my house caused me to feel sick and I will never use this again

Excellent product and performance. Cooked 4 chicken thighs from scratch and they were perfect. See attached photos. Very much like oven fried chicken but without having to heat up the oven. The recipe booklet was worthless. Must have been written for non-traditional American tastes and translated to English, but I have been cooking for 50+ years and never heard of most of the things they had recipes for. But just adapt your own recipes and go from there. There are a lot of recipes out there I am excited to try. So glad I bit the bullet and bought this.
Great unit so far. Had a small issue with the first one but the seller reached out and made it right.
Love this air fryer....makes getting meals ready faster..easier...less clean up

I have used it twice burning fish sticks and shell on shrimp the first time. It cooks quickly! Second use, about ten marinated wingettes. When I removed the slide out basket , if you slightly tilt it , all the grease from the bottom of the basket comes out spilling everywhere!! There are vents all around the basket and close to the bottom/ sides. I probably would not have bought it knowing this.
Not quite fried, just the best baked items ever. Who ever invented these things gets a GOLD STAR!!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to use and great taste!
reviews.reviewText: This product is very simple to use, cleaning it is extremely quick and easy, and the taste is actually a lot better than I had expected. Before this, I used a typical oil fryer. My husband, who can be a very picky eater, was skeptical about his French fries in an air fryer. We made frozen McCain French fries in it and they came out perfect. They tasted a little different from NOT being suspended in oil, but they had a perfect crunch with a still soft inside. My husband was quite pleased there was not much of a difference in taste or crispiness. It is VERY LARGE. I thought it would be about the size of our 12 cup coffee pot, but it was a lot bigger. See pictures for size reference. Overall, very happy the purchase, the ease of cleaning and the taste of the foods made in it.
Made good frozen fries. I am concerned that cook wear to use in the fryer may be hard to find as the fryers diameter is very small.

reviews.reviewTitle: They are easy to use and clean up is easy.
reviews.reviewText: I sent it to my nephew for his apartment at Longwood University. Since he is in college I thought he could use it

I love fried food (I use various healthy oils; grape seed, olive, avocado) but I hate the mess. This contains everything so no splashing. Very easy to clean. I put the basket in the sink to soak while we eat and then lightly scrub afterward. So easy to make chicken wings, fried shrimp, and lots of vegetables. We got it for Christmas and my wife commented that I seem to use have used it every day since. Very happy.

I purchased one of these on 4/29/2019 through Amazon prime. I got the item on 5/1/2019. I followed all instructions for setup. I attempted to prepare a meal on the same day I got the item, however I was surprised to find out the item did not work. I requested a refund immediately. Do not waste your time with a cooking item that does not work right out of the box. It may be a fire hazard.

Better than I thought it would be!! The first use gives off a chemical smell but subsequent uses are fine. It’s easy to use, easy to clean (no harsh scrubbing needed), and doesn’t take up a huge amount of counter space. We’re very happy with this purchase!

I got this mostly because i wanted something that crisps food better than "oven frying". It does the job pretty good. I've cooked chicken fingers, fish sticks, tater tots, shake n bake, chicken wings... I even cook those frozen hamburger patties. It does a much better job than the oven. Not quite a crispy at dumping your food into a big pot of hot grease, but definitely cleaner and easier, not to mention healthier. It may take an attempt or two to figure out the times, temps, and technique that suit you, but once you do it makes cooking crispy food a breeze.

This size is just about right for two people.

I usually hand wash the basket and tray, but have also tossed them in the dishwasher with no ill-effects.
It cooks very small amounts of food. FOUR peaces at a time. Maybe good for one or two persons.

reviews.reviewTitle: Low quality- coating came off after 3 uses
reviews.reviewText:
Updated: So the seller contacted me and offer to send another frying rack. I am very pleased by their customer service as they seem to genuinely care about the customer. This time, i used it for 1.5 week, and the coating seem fine (I wash both by hand and with a dishwasher). Therefore, I have decided to change my review. The airfryers work really well.

Initial Review:
Note: The picture was taken at the beginning and the end of a week.
I bought this on July 20. Within 3 weeks that I bought this, the coating from the basket has come off. And I literally used it for 3 times. This is supposed to be dishwasher compatible??? How could this happen???

And today, it developed to what seemed to be Orange RUST (see the first 2 pictures). This is not only low quality but seem to be unsafe too??? Have anyone had the same problem as mine?

I never imagined that I could have fries so quickly and delicious. My very first batch the family devoured them immediately. I love it so much already and I can’t wait to try fried chicken later and many more in the future! Wow! Buy this thing! So easy to use!

Update: On my second day with this machine my family member dropped it and it cracked severely. I contacted customer service for ultrean, and they not only responded quickly, but now have a replacement model out in transit. What wonderful customer service!

Update: I have now had this air fryer for a few months and have cooked a bunch of stuff in it. Holds up well and doesn’t heat up my kitchen like the oven does. It’s such a nifty machine. Still highly recommend.

reviews.reviewTitle: Works as expected, fails on simple things.
reviews.reviewText: Does everything you would expect from an air fryer. Food is good and crispy. The only problem I have is that you can't easily get your food out without the grease getting all over it. You could take out the grill but it's cumbersome and you have to balance your food so it doesn't fall into the grease. You can't dump it out because grease would get all over the place. It should have a removable grease tray. Also, cleaning is weird because of the vents on the side. Grease and pieces of food get stuck in them so you have to be really mindful of that while cleaning.
Love it very easy to use and clean. I left it soaking in the sink there was no rust.

I have been thinking of getting an air fryer for awhile now. The price point and the comments regarding customer service finally pushed me to purchase this fryer. Best cooking gadget I have ever purchased! I have had it for 4 days and have used it every day! I have made fries, fish, shrimp, potatoes, and bacon in this marvel! The flavor is amazing and I have not used any oil yet. I did purchase an accessory kit but have not used it yet - still making things as it came.

I am great at burning things in the pan and in the oven. I really like how you can open the basket to check the food as it is cooking without losing the time or the temperature. I have not burned one thing!

It is extremely easy to clean! It is large, but I WILL make room for it on my counter!

Great investment!

I am really enjoying a new way to cook. You definitely have to change a few things with time, temperatures and preparation of food. It doesn’t taste like it’s been fried, that can be good or bad. You do have to time your cooking because the basket seems small and takes a few baskets to feed everybody. Clean up is simple and quick. Only challenge was counter space or pantry when not in use. It has kind of a big footprint.

Best new edition for the kitchen. If you like frozen foods that go in a toaster oven or oven you need one of these. The shoelace french fries come out tasting alot like McDonalds. My toddler loves them!

I have done chicken nuggets, tacitos, pizza rolls, and french fries and an attempt at chips. I still need to learn how to do chips but with a mandolin you can make all kinds of chip type things.

The box was fine and the item did not have any visible damage, but the air fryer would not power up.

EDIT: Seller contacted me and sent me a replacement immediately. New air fryer is working perfectly. Great customer service.

My husband recently purchased this air fryer. I like the large capacity and the ease of use. However, I have not done too much in it yet. Tried making sweet potato chips and they burned, like zucchini sticks and I cooked some purchased barbecue wings in it, they were good. I can see that this will be nice to use in the summer when you don't want to heat up the kitchen using the oven. I need to practice!

Bought this form my 85 year old father (who heard good things about an airless fryer and wanted to try). He loves it and uses it everyday to make something. He's had no issues using it, but has problems problems answering his smartphone.
So I take it's screen is easy to understand. He wishes there was a precise outline of cooking times, but is having a hoot experimenting.

Bought for my mother. She's elderly and has health problems. She can't cook a lot of times due to it. She loves this because it's so easy to use. She doesn't have to stand around cooking. Easy to clean. Cooks amazing food. Can't recommend highly enough.

Got it for my wife for Christmas, we have been using it about once a week. 2 months ago it started giving an E1 error and now it doesn't work at all. It appears that the fan stopped working. It didn't even last 6 months, do not buy

reviews.reviewTitle: Buy it it you enjoy gourmet food.
reviews.reviewText: I don’t have a comparison because I have never tried another brand; however I have recommended this one to many people. It is so simple to use, quick and a really healthy way to cook. I make a lot of asparagus and brussel sprouts as well as other vegetables. I also use it for salmon and chicken wings mostly, but have cooked filet mignon, tilapia and many other things. I was gifted mine about 8 months ago and use it nearly every day. I just purchased it as a gift for a friend now. Anyone who enjoys good, healthy food can confidently purchase this. Use silicone tongs and spatulas so you don’t scratch it.

I am so disappointed with this air fryer!!!!
Has a horrible smell when being used I had to throw it out... I was away on vacation and forgot to return it and missed my window of opportunity to return this item.

reviews.reviewTitle: Wonderful product that I would recommend!
reviews.reviewText: This is my first experience with an air fryer. I am eating a ketogenic lifestyle and wanted to try fried foods using pork rinds as a crust and this air fryer works perfectly for that. My husband uses it to cook fried chicken. The juices stay inside and the outside is cooked perfectly with panko or any other coating. It Cooks things like bacon, cheesecake just about anything that an oven can bake this can do better with almost zero cleanup. Love this and have bought another as a gift for my son and daughter-in-law. Does not take up a lot of space on counter like some of the air fryers I have seen. Very easy to use. Bakes or fries things in about 2/3 the time . Wipe clean with a paper towel. Wonderful product that I would recommend.

reviews.reviewTitle: It does not reset when the power is turned off.
reviews.reviewText: Purchased in return for the burned. Plus - it works, non-stick coating, simple operation. Cons - the lack of a grill. Efficiency is worse than the previous model (with the same power) - a piece of meat is cooked five minutes longer. And most importantly - completely turn off the power (remove the cord from the outlet), and turn it on after five minutes. Fryer continues to work from a breakpoint !!! This is already unsafe.
Broke after a month. Unable to return

reviews.reviewTitle: Glad I bought this air fryer!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve only had my Ultrean Air Fryer for a short period of time, but I’ve used it for chicken which, with a flour and egg coating, came out deliciously crispy on the outside and moist inside; roasted red peppers (wonderful)!; zucchini fries (great!); and Taquitos - I was delighted with everything I’ve cooked. I purchased an air fryer cookbook and have just ordered a couple of pans for it so I can try some of the one-dish recipes in the cookbook - one-dish foods are my favorites. I wasn’t sure I’d use the air fryer a lot when I got it, but I think it will be my go-to for food prep now.

I generally like this, a lot. Use it quite a bit for roasted style veggies, or any frozen appetizers. My one complaint is the tray at the bottom is held tight by these little rubber stoppers. I lost one, right away, washing it, so I can't really shake the basket, anymore. I have to use tongs. It also take way longer than any air fryer recipe quotes. So, caution buyers.

reviews.reviewTitle: Proof is in the use - amazing taste without oil!
reviews.reviewText:
After hearing family members rave about air fryers, I did my research and finally gave in and bought this item.
It is amazingly easy to use and I can't rave enough about the crispy french fries/potato wedges, onion rings, etc. that it can produce. WITH NO OIL! Very simple use and clean up. I would absolutely recommend and I would purchase it, again.

I’ve used this for a week and cooked wings, frozen fries, biscuits, omelets and steak fries from raw potatoes. All have been good and the air fryer is very easy to operate. Clean up is a breeze since the basket and insert can both be soaked in dishwater. For $69.99 it is a great bargain.

My daughter bought this because she has wanted one for a long time and she is very pleased with her purchase. She is a full time college student who commutes an hour each way to campus and wanted to be able to still make healthy meals with the limited time she has. The price was great and the product is awesome!

reviews.reviewTitle: High Quality. Large Tray. Easy to Use
reviews.reviewText: We're still learning how to cook everything in it. But we have used it almost every day since we got it. The price was great. A daily deal. This is a great size. There is a learning curve with these things. But once you get the hang of it, and find your little tips and tricks you will love air cooking. We have a spray bottle with a little coconut oil. We spray our fries with it to make them have that extra crunch we want. This is a very high quality frier though. Very high end looking. People compliment it when they come over. I love it!

This exceeded my expectations. So easy to use - a 5 yr old could use it! Clean up was a breeze. Food tasted great (so far have made fried shrimp, sweet potato fries and even out leftover pizza in there to heat/jazz up. Delicious! Only suggestion for improvement - include more recipes! Only a few were provided and they worked great!!

so far so good
large tray and easy interface

hope it lasts

initial rubber smell will disappear as u use and clean
This is a new item for an 89 year old, learning to cook anew due to my wife's eyesight. So far, I have had no problem making good meals with less trouble than some of our other kitchen appliances.

It makes really amazing fried food without actually frying it. I think it does frozen doods better than thawed ones because they can be a bit dried out. You do have to fiddle around with temperature to get it right. But its worth it for slightly healthier food.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great for French fries in under 10 minutes
reviews.reviewText: Great for baked goods in half the time. I wouldnt suggest doing the times they list. Do less heat and less time and make sure you check on your food. French fries at 425 degrees for 16 minutes I do at 320 degrees for 10 minutes.

After months of use, this is still one of my favorite appliances. This was one of the cheaper models I found on Amazon so I was worried it might not lost, but it is still making some good food. Only issues I've had with it are: 1. The buttons on the front do have a cheap quality to them, specifically the power button gets stuck if pushed the wrong way. 2. Cleaning can be kind of a pain when cleaning by hand
Just received this today and was hoping to use it but it doesn't work AT ALL.

reviews.reviewTitle: Does not work like it should!
reviews.reviewText: Have tried this air fryer and can say that it doesn't work well at all. Have only made french fries (with and without oil) and the potatoes are always hard. Save your money and don't buy this product!

I bought a “6.2” quart model first and it was HUGE. This model is exactly the size I needed. It heats up quickly, is quiet (I couldn’t believe how quiet!), and, surprisingly, emitted just a little heat. It was FAST at cooking and is simple to use.

reviews.reviewTitle: So helpful and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Only thing I didn't like was the size, I thought it will be a bit smaller, but I still manage to accommodate it in my small kitchen. Other than that, I love how everything can be cooked in 15 to 20 minutes hassle free. Cleaning is the easiest.

I have been finding new recipes for air frying online, and I am enjoying using my new kitchen tool. It's great to make food without having to use a lot of oil. My husband loved the shrimp I made, and the frozen french fries too. It's very easy to clean.

reviews.reviewTitle: Works as advertised, but it got damaged after 5 months of light use
reviews.reviewText:
Update!
Ultra lean contacted me after this review and offer to replace the air fryer or refund the amount paid, since it was under warranty. It worked perfectly until the Start button broke. Other than that, I loved it.

I have had this Air fryer for almost 5 months, and it worked perfectly. Now, all of sudden it stopped working. The on button got stuck inside the machine and doesn’t work, it doesn’t start at all. I opened the panel to bring it back to the correct position and it still doesn’t start.

reviews.reviewTitle: Overall a decent machine for the price
reviews.reviewText: The air fryer cooks the food great and it tastes great. Its a little tedious to clean though and after months of rigorous use, the nonstick coating on the grill starts to come off. It doesn't get rusty though so I'm not super worried about it. Its a very reasonably priced machine for how well it cooks.

Love this air fryer. I wasn't sure I wanted another appliance taking space on my counter that I might rarely use. But, glad I decided to buy it - I use it almost daily for hot dogs to steaks, fries to veggies to chicken. Steaks are comparable to grilled. It's easy to use and to clean.

So I expected almost nothing getting this, I just wanted an easy way to make fries in all honesty. But turns out you can fry pizza rolls too!!! Look I'm not saying my diet is bad, I'm just saying I've had pizza rolls and rally's fries about 6 days in a row and I dont regret it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Love the convince, until it blew up lol
reviews.reviewText:
I've been using this item for a few months now and it has legit changed my entire life. I rave about airfrying to everyone I know. I cook 10x more than I ever did. HOWEVER this morning as I was preparing my lunch for work, I noticed it began to smoke up and upon further investigation was melting/burning the bottom plastic of the air fryer. There is now a giant hole in it and I'm assuming it is no longer usable. I don't know if the air fryer itself com-busted, or if a fuse in my power outlet caused it to essentially blow up, but either way I'm v upset.

still giving it 3 stars bc I loved it while it last and I'll still be getting another air fryer, but probably not this one just to be safe.

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to use and excellent, reliable product!
reviews.reviewText: Wow! Highly recommend this product! I used to hate broccoli and cauliflower for that matter but add some olive oil and seasoning, toss and throw in air fryer....close your eyes and you’ll swear you are eating French fries! Plus, stuff takes minimal time to cook and crisp up; no assembly required and easy clean up. Panko covered chicken tastes like chicken tenders. I only wish I knew about this product earlier! It is fantastic and we use it daily. Keeps oven off and kitchen clean too!
My husband wanted chicken wings, which I usually bake for at least 1-1/2 hours in oven. It took only 1/2 hour and the wings were perfect. I love this air fryer and will try other things as well.

I'm only giving this 4 stars because it took quite a while to be delivered. I originally ordered it for the standard shipping but something went wrong while being shipped, so it ended up being delivered a week later then intended. Luckily Amazon alerted me about the dely and ask if I still wanted the air fryer. I said yes and it was delivered. Other than that, I love this air fryer! It's really easy to use and the food comes out great! It's very easy to clean too. I got the turquoise one and I love the color. It's very true to the picture. It goes very well in my kitchen 😊

We bought a small fryer a year or so back. We are a family of 3 adults and this size works well for us. I researched price verses coustomer reviews and this one stacked up really well with size and what I wanted to pay. It has not disappointed.

We have air fried salmon, okra, squash, potatoes, chicken, and sausage. All were delicious. Results are quick and very tasty! Cleanup is quick and easy. Easily cooks enough for three people at one time. All the taste with less greasy fat. It was a surprise gift for my wife and she loves it!

I spent LOTS of time researching and figuring out should I buy an air-fryer if yes then which one. Picked this product as my final choice. I’m SO pleased with the outcome had to write a review. Everything I cook tastes really good, just make sure to shake whatever you are cooking in every 5-8 min. SUPER easy to clean, easy to use. Makes a little noise but nothing disturbing. Highly recommended!!!
Food taste great using the Air Fryer. Chicken is so crispy can't believe it hasn't been fried. Only negative is clean up isn't that easy food tends to stick and hard to clean.

Excellent value for the price. I had a smaller version which I mistakenly gave away. I missed it terribly and when I saw the larger version at a great price I had to jump on it. It is easy to clean and maintain. I do wish it came with more receipes.
I have used my Ultrean once on Keto Crispy Chicken Breast....I totally look forward to using it for tons of things!! I was getting discouraged with Keto, but the Ultrean has given me my second wind!

reviews.reviewTitle: Love how it cook hate cleaning it
reviews.reviewText: I’ve never had an air fryer before so I’m not sure if there all like this but cleaning it was difficult and around the screws was very hard, but it cooked really well over all I’m happy with it

reviews.reviewTitle: I’m very happy with my purchase!!
reviews.reviewText: I love this air fryer, it’s affordable in comparison to a lot of the other ones it very affordable. It gets the job done perfectly. It’s very powerful so make sure you don’t set the temperature too high. I always start the timer at ten minutes rather than 15 for precooked frozen items, an I set the temperature to 360. Anyway I love it and think it’s a great purchase.
Love this machine it's great for quick cooking of just about anything.

reviews.reviewTitle: Bachelor amateur chef seal of approval
reviews.reviewText: Son loves it. Good thing because if he were to traditionally fry his meals he be looking at a weight problem

reviews.reviewTitle: I love my Air Fryer! Easy to use and clean.
reviews.reviewText:
I have cooked chicken for my family and they didn't know it was fried in grease. I sprayed it lightly with pan.
Great for mozzarella sticks and anything else you cook in the oven.

Unable to use all the features as the buttons don't work. Unable to change temperature settings. Stays at 370.
The open/close button does not work. Had high hopes for this but not worth the headache.

This air fryer made my life easy; I’m a working mom and always tired to cook when I’m home. But with the help of this I’m able to feed my daughter in few minutes. I even taught my 11 year old daughter to use this. I’ve saved a lot of money I usually order food.
Purchsed for my father. My husband made French fries in it the day he opened it up and they were great!

Amazing. Pork chops cooked in this are great. Just a little olive oil and seasoning on pork chops and 15 minutes later you have delicious browned pork chops. Also this comes with a one year warranty which out does most of the other brands.

I've heard so much about air fryers, that I was looking forward to cooking with one. I have cooked several things in it, but have been mostly disappointed. The tator tots were good - browned and crispy and so were the potato wedges. However, the breaded okra with potatoes were yucky looking and tasting. You actually have to add as much extra virgin olive oil (EVOO), coconut oil, etc., as you would normally do for oven baking or frying on top of the stove. It came with little to none instructions, so you either have to do research or "wing-it". My daughter received a Ninja Air Fryer for Christmas which gives more and better instructions. Don't waste your money on this one.
I got mine for my birthday Wednesday and used it for the first time today. The only problem was there is no drip pan when cooking meat. The grease pours out of the vents on the basket.

This was a gift from our daughters. Overall, it's a nice air fryer. We use it several times a week. The size is great for 2-3 people. It seems to cook faster than most recipes state, so that's a learning curve. Two things I'm not happy with:
1. It's hard to clean the center of the insert. There's a small bar running over the middle, and food gets cooked on underneath.
2. The side vents on the basket vent up. If you have any liquid created while cooking, it spills out if you tip the basket to empty. Also grease and pieces of food get stuck in the vents, so you have to be really diligent when cleaning. If they vented down, you could rinse the vents under water to remove any debris.

I'm not sure how these two quirks compare to other air fryers, but they are something I'd check out before purchasing another one.

Recieved as a gift and pulled it our of box. Flashed and error code. Very cheap product. Even feels not put together well. Was hoping I could just send it back for a replacement but they will not honor that unless I return it to whomever gifted it to me and have them call or use their information. Pretty bad customer service. Dont purchase!!!

I looked for an air fryer with a good rating, great reviews and low cost after seeing one at my brother's. I have had fun experimenting and find it very simple to use. Not a rule follower, I tried leaving the skins on potatoes to "fry" and just blotting the cut strips with paper towels rather than doing all of the soaking and rinsing. I sprayed with cooking oil instead of coating with regular oil. I've guessed at temperatures and cooking times when cooking something not included in the recipes. I think I would compare it to baking in the oven more than frying, which I rarely do. It's super simple to check the status of something you're cooking and then adjust time and temperature if you want. I have cooked brownies and corn bread, using my own recipes in a small souffle dish. I'm just careful not to over fill a cooking dish that has batter in it. I use it while doing the remaining foods for a meal. Easy to clean. I love it!

————————

My wife and I tried it out tonight.
It worked perfectly and I must say I’m shocked at how good our French Fries were (we used no oil at all). The fries were hot, soft on the inside and crispy on the outside.

So, after the customer service follow up, I change my review to 5 stars. They went out of their way to make us happy.

Well done.

Shipping was fast so I tried this product immediately. I made fries and chicken nuggets from frozen and they came out hot and crispy! This is great for heating food to crisp that the microwave just doesn't do. I think I am going to be using this for all my frozen pre cooked snacks.

I have used this several times already and am quite pleased with results and ease of use. My one complaint is that the tray in the basket is already--after a few uses--losing it's coating, and I have not used abrasive cleaners on it. I feel it should not do that this quickly. They should come up with a more durable solution to this, as the food sits directly on it and I am wondering now if we are ingesting the coating when we eat the food?!

reviews.reviewTitle: Smart and Easy way to cook and fry with/without extra grease
reviews.reviewText:
There are dozens of models of "Air Fryers" out there, and hard to choose from them (most made in China).
I chose this puppy based on "verified buyers" ratings, which -- of course -- is not always the truth about it...
To my surprise, it cooked meat and veggies to my liking "fresh out of the box".
Intelligent machine, self intuitive settings, without a useless array of knobs and buttons.
Smart -- if not summary -- owners manual, and a 10 recipe booklet were included.
For our needs (we are a 76 years old couple) it makes our cooking time much easier and effortless, not to say healthier, considering the option to "deep fry" without the "deep" and without any grease...
Of course, for added taste, we spray small amounts of olive oil in a can, between turning the food over, for a thorough cooking and glazing.
As for its "Durability" ratings - it remains to be seen -although an average of $80 is not that cheap to experiment with...

We got the fryer for Christmas and our first trial was PF Chang's Pot Stickers (see video). We covered the basket with foil per instructions and applied a small amount of oil to avoid sticking. Instructions said 10-12 minutes on 400 degrees then turn them over and cook for another 8 minutes. I think we did 11 minutes and they were slightly over-done, so maybe next time we'll try 10 minutes on the first side and perhaps 7 minutes on the other side instead of the 8-minute recommendation. We served them with a little soy sauce and they were a little crispy but great!

This was well worth the money! I had it about 6 weeks and still find foods I can use it with. So easy to fry with extremely little oil that food is not greasy. I’ve reheated corn bread, biscuits and garlic bread. Love the fries that this fryer makes and so easy to clean. Works great for 3-4 people.

So far I love it! First thing I made was a chicken breast. I've never had one that was so moist and juicy. You have to experiment with the time. I had to up the time a bit. I've also made pizza rolls. Before, I'd throw them in the microwave and of course, the crust was mushy. The oven would take too long. They came out perfect. Crunchy crust and melted on the inside. The Teflon makes cleaning a breeze. It's also very easy to use. The digital screen is easy to use and understand. I'm single so this size is just right. I'd say if you have a family you'd want to go with a larger size. I definitely would recommend this air fryer!

I bought this as a gift for my mom's birthday, but she didn't want it (said she never cooks). So I decided to keep it. I used it last night to cook some boneless, skinless chicken thighs. I didn't have any breading or seasonings on it. I cooked it 10 minutes on one side, flipped them and cooked it another 10 minutes (at 350). They were DELICIOUS. Very juicy and excellent flavor. I'm very happy with my air fryer and recommend it to everyone!

Honestly I have only fried stuff from frozen packages. I wouldn't say that it fried them the way oil does it. To me it still felt like I'm eating a bake version. That being said it is a lot faster than the over. 10 min to cook a burger is not to shabby in my books. The basket is not fully enclose though so oil and grease will leak out if you pull it out and tilt it some. Just be careful and try to keep everything level. Cleaning is also not the easiest as gunk and grease from the food do get caught in the air holes and there is a lot of them.

I have experimented with frozen vegetables, French fries, and a whole chicken. All meals came out well. I especially like doing the chicken. It comes out done and juicy. The instruction book is lacking and rather brief. My main puzzle with cooker is about 2 to 3 minutes into the cooking, no matter the food item, the kitchen smoke alarm goes off. The alarm will stop blaring after a while and all is fine. It's just that short period of time at at the beginning of the cook cycle........ No smoke, just alarm.

I live this thing. It’s like a little oven and microwave all in one. I wish I had bought one sooner. Bacon is the best in here. One thing you have to remember is you can dump hot grease out bc of the holes in the side. Found that out the hard way but that’s my fault I guess. I haven’t had the peeling or anything like other people mentioned.

So happy I purchased this air fryer. It is easy to use..just set temperature and time. There are lots of recipes on Pinterest.....cleanup is easy...the frying pan and insert wash up easily. The only negative is the size..air fryers are BIG...had to send the first one I ordered back, it was a family size and huge. The one I have now is medium sized...still large , but manageable. I would buy it again.

reviews.reviewTitle: wish i would have bought sooner
reviews.reviewText: i love chicken wings. grandkids love french fries. i hate to use hot oil in the kitchen because of the smoke / greasy smell that permeates the house. this fryer is the only one i have tried but i love it. i spay a little oil in the pot and fill it with anything i would fry or convection bake and the results are great. after every kids party or cook out that i make fries with it the other adults are ready to buy one. great product.
